program P
interface Comparator{
    bool compare(int x, int y);
}
class LT implements Comparator
{
    {
        bool compare(int x, int y)
        {
            if(x<y) return true;
            else return false;
        }
    }
}
class GT implements Comparator
{
    {
        bool compare(int x, int y)
        {
            if(x>y) return true;
            else return false;
        }
    }
}
class Base
{
    int x;
    {
        void f(){x=1;}
    }
}
class Der extends Base
{
    //int x;
    {
        void f(){x=2;}
    }
}

Comparator comparators[];
{
    void sort(int x[], int cmp)
    int i,j,t;
    {
        for(i=0;i<len(x)-1;i++)
        {
            for(j=i+1;j<len(x);j++)
            {
                if(comparators[cmp].compare(x[i],x[j])!=true)
                {
                    t=x[i];
                    x[i]=x[j];
                    x[j]=t;
                }
            }
        }
    }
    void main()
    Base b;
    Der d;
    {
        print(123,6);
        print(eol);
        print(1,6);
        print(eol);
        d=new Der;
        b=d;
        b.f();
        print(b.x);
        print(d.x);
    }
}
